Hi, I'm Derek Little, a Creative Technologist with a passion for exploring emerging technologies and developing intelligent and engaging user experiences.

As both a designer and developer, I have a knack for navigating the sometimes disparate thought processes of business strategy, creative aspirations and technical know-how and bring a thoughtful, forward-thinking approach to any new project.

As a creative thinker and problem solver, I love the challenge of making new "things" to achieve client goals and have a proven track record of delivering successful websites, applications and rich media for such clients as Disney, ABC, Toys “R” Us, Conde Nast, Doctors Without Borders and ASPCA.
